      • setTheme

        public static void setTheme(java.util.List<javafx.scene.layout.Pane> panes)
        Sets the applications theme. Currently dark and white mode are available, but white mode is not supported by every developer.
        Parameters:
        panes - All panes to set the theme for.

      • darkModeActive

        public static boolean darkModeActive()
        Indicates whether the dark mode is currently active.
        Returns:
        True for an active dark mode, false otherwise.

      • hamburgerMenuTransition

        Adds a slide in and out animation to a JFX hamburger menu.
        Parameters:
        ham - The hamburger menu to add the animation for.
        button - The hamburger menu's button.
